testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.content1: Study Cycle has transformed the way I learn. The adaptive courses and skill tracking keep me motivated.
testimonials.content2: As a teacher, I love how Study Cycle makes it easy to create and share custom learning paths.
testimonials.content3: I can easily track my child's progress and see where they need help. Great platform!

earlyStage.title: We're Just Getting Started
earlyStage.description: Study Cycle is in early development. We're building a complete adaptive learning platform, but we don't have social proof of our value yet.
earlyStage.pricing: For now, the price is symbolic (R$9.90 / US$2.99 per month) only to cover the infrastructure needed to keep the platform running.
earlyStage.noProof: We don't have testimonials or success metrics to share yet, but we're working hard to build something valuable for you.
